displayName: Ensure that Activity Log Retention is set 365 days or greater
rationale: A log profile controls how the activity log is exported and retained. Since the average time to detect a breach is 210 days, the activity log should be retained for 365 days or more in order to have time to respond to any incidents.
recommended_action:
1. Go to Activity log
2. Select Export
3. Set Retention (days) is set to 365 or 0
4. Select Save
error_message: Retention policy is not enabled for this log profile
ruleNames: Ensure that log rentention length satisfies requirements
